title: Short Introduction to Why I Don't Buy Correspondence Truth Theory
description:
This is effectively an introduction to why I don't subscribe to Correspondence Truth Theory. I used this article as a starting place to talk about it: https://thethink.institute/articles/the-very-concept-of-truth-is-impossible-without-god I could very well be mistaken here, but these are my honest ideas. I think truth is so much bigger than a set of propositions that correspond to reality. 

This is episode 63 of my podcast. 

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
